name: Grand Library Under-Table Skim
description: Inspired by the forum’s "Grand Library" discussion, this level recreates a dim, wood-paneled reading room dominated by an enormous antique wooden table.  The drone begins at the mansion’s main stairway, threads through ground-floor halls, then drops under the table to collect intel before escaping through a partially blocked exit.  Tight leg spacing, poor light, and a "radio" (represented by a floor fan) beside one table leg force ultra-precise manoeuvres.  Extra furniture, crates, and décor scattered throughout the mansion add optional slalom challenges while ensuring the environment feels lived-in and cluttered, and overhead turbulence (windEnabled) simulates down-wash in confined air.  The player must touch two checkpoints on the way to the objective under the table, then reach the far corner of the checker room to exfiltrate.
checkpoint_locationIds: corner entrance of long bottom room
middle of hallway of top hallway
startpoint_locationId: base of stairs of main stairway
endpoint_locationId: in corner of checker corner room
